name: Starcatchers (dziabak)
description:
Starcatchers is an atmospheric game inspired by stories by Jules Verne in which you navigate the ship through perilous night sky to catch stars and form constellations.

The game combines free-form gameplay with exciting skirmishes and environmental hazards known from action games.

In Starcatchers you explore the actual night sky, with its most famous stars and constellations.

Use the arrow keys to steer the ship.

Press Z to shoot.

Press X to boost.

Press C to use the compass.

Your goal is to find all stars. Only then you will form the constellation.

Watch out for falling meteors and asteroids. They will damage your ship!

On the mission you will encounter many enemies, but don't worry. Fight back!

Developed by Grzegorz Dąbrowski

Music by LawnReality

http://lawnreality.newgrounds.com/

https://lawnreality.bandcamp.com/

https://www.youtube.com/user/LawnReality
